basics.name: Eric Sexton
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm Eric Sexton, a personable Software Engineer with a Computer Science degree from Purdue Fort Wayne. Beyond my tech skills at Ferguson Advertising, I'm actively involved in the community as a Global Game Jam Organizer and Mentor. Passionate about game development and collaboration, I bring a proactive and adaptable nature to projects. Eager to contribute character and skills to innovative teams.

work.name: Ferguson Advertising
work.description: Ferguson is a truly full-service agency: Strategy. Advertising. Digital. PR. Social Media. Video. Media.
highlights: Designed the architecture for the company's first SaaS product (RV Management Platform) using Node.js, Typescript, Prisma, PostgreSQL, and React.js
Led an effort to move self-hosted services to cloud provider and to automate build processes to improve developer efficiency
Implemented SAML and Auth0 integration for enterprises level clients.
Developed scalable REST APIs using Node.js and built intuitive front-end interfaces with Nuxt.js
Integrated headless CMS platforms like PayloadCMS for seamless content management
Utilized Angular, PHP, and WordPress for diverse web development projects

work.name: Copper Loom

volunteer.position: Global Game Jam Organizer and Mentor
volunteer.summary: Purdue Fort Wayne's Association of Computers and Machinery is a student organization that hosts events for students to learn about computer science and network with other students and professionals.

projects.name: RV Management Platform
projects.description: A SaaS product that helps RV and Boat malefactors collect, manage, and generate their marketing material from a single system. This system then powers tools for Buyers to find the perfect RV or Boat for their needs and Dealers to generate marketing material, quotes, and technical specifications for their inventory.
